title: shambhO shankara
sahitya:
shambhO shankarA sadAshivashashi shEkhara karuNAkara bhavabhaya hara

anupallavi
 
ambOruha nayananum pOdurai ayanum tEDiyum ariyAda bhUm-pAda nAtha
vinOda

caraNam
 
ambA samEta Adi anAtha svayambhO subOdha sugandha gIta sukham
kunjaradAsanum peravE tAn nidam taravE nI vibhO varavENum prabhO hara hara hara
shubhakaravara
